title: jwt:logout
description: let's see how to make logout feature in jwt(Json Web Token) authentication system.

title: jwt:refresh token
description: let's see how to refresh the issued token in jwt(Json Web Token) which is one of the token based authentication systems.

title: jwt:user information
description: let's see how to get user information from login user in jwt(Json Web Token) which is one of the token based authentication systems.

title: jwt:signin
description: let's make signin procedure by using jwt(Json Web Token) which is one of token based authentication systems.

title: jwt:signup
description: let's make signup feature by using jwt(Json Web Token) whicih is a token based authentication system.

title: jwt installation&settings
description: introduce how to install and configure jwt(Json Web Token) Middleware to use token based authentication system on Laravel.
